name: The Bad Girls Club
description:
A Game For A game by its cover Gamejam

based of a Famicase entry BY Sonic9jct

with music by Yubatake on OpengameArt.org

controls

PC

Movement: keyboard arrows Arrows

interact : x key

get unstuck : R key

s : switch Audio (on/off)

Android.

Movement :touch where you want to go

interact : touch the onscreen prompt

get unstuck :back button

to start click on the tittle screen

To exit . close the aPPlication forcefully

Changelog

v0.86

Corrections in collision system and failsafe system.

Oldest versions.

Web version

added 100% keyboard controls.
